translation:
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

I inform Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency Picada Camp, December 9, 1838. Sir Tomás José da Silva. Francisco Pedro de Abreu Major.

See previously in that of 1839 of the same. [Attributed to Alfredo Varela, on page 1r.]
